ygData.subject: Re: (no subject)
ygData.msgSnippet: I have to agree with this .. Monks really do have the p*** taken out of them because everyone knows they need netted armour and upwards, but I have to say that
ygData.messageBody:
I have to agree with this .. Monks really do have the p*** taken out of them
because everyone knows they need netted armour and upwards, but I have to
say that I am yet to meet a fellow monk that shares the same thoughts. I
managed to get myself a full set of netted from a troll for 4pp al that was
missing was the gloves .. which I expected to pay up to 2pp for, even though
I begrudge paying it .. Imagine my supprise when I auctioned for a pair and
a fellow monk offered me some for "Oh the least I will take is 10pp" .. this
was on Erollisi Marr server

Perhaps an all monk guild would address this problem?

Masafumi

>From: Aaron Braunstein <aaron_spam@...>
>
> I'm planning on making a run into Upper Guk tonight and am at a
>loss as far as finding maps of this region go. Does anybody have any
>references they wouldn't mind sharing? I'd appreciate it.
> BTW: I'm on E'ci, so if anybody would like to purchase any of the
>netted/woven/mesh items I obtain, I would be happy to sell them to you at a
>discount (we monks have to stick together... :) )
>
>--
>Aaron Braunstein
>Pacific Data Management, Inc.
>
><aaron_braunstein@...>
>
